Title: CUSTOM Personalized US Army Military Pocket Watch 31" Necklace Unisex
Description: Please check my shop announcement on my homepage for important updates and information regarding delivery timelines during the Christmas holidays, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, and Father's Day. Handsome customized vintage style US Army which has an Eagle & Stars design pocket watch which comes with a 31" long chain and has a numbered seconds dial. You can personalize this watch with your own message which is permanently attached inside the watch. Your customized message might include a name, dates of service, date of enlistment, retirement date, or your own personal message. Would make a great gift for any service man or woman, or possibly an enlistment, retirement, promotion, anniversary, birthday or groom's gift. You find the reason to give this one of a kind gift! You will receive a proof of how your design will look prior to the creation of the actual item. How to Order: 1. Purchase this listing 2. In "comments to seller" at checkout, type in your MESSAGE (exactly as you would like it to appear). MAXIMUM of 45 CHARACTERS. Please note that the more characters, the smaller the lettering. The cover of the pocket watch is decorated with a raised design of UNITED STATES ARMY Seal. Nicely decorated case back design. Made of a bronzed metal. In excellent new working order, quartz battery, keeps good time and comes with a spare battery. The watch measures 1 7/8" in diameter not including the stem. The customized insert is permanently attached and protected with a coating of acrylic for many years of enjoyment. We also offer custom pocket watches for the US Navy, US Marines, and US Air Force. For every military watch sold, a one dollar donation will be given to the Wounded Warriors Project. Comes gift wrapped. All of my items comes form a smoke free, happy healthy home. Everything is in very good to excellent condition. Any exceptions will be clearly noted. I will be placing many items on auction. Many vintage treasures! I list many separately so you can pick and choose your favorites. I absolutely DO COMBINE SHIPPING, so shop away. Thank you for visiting Bright Eyes Treasures!! California residents add 8% sales tax. Paypal shipped within 1 business days; contact me for other forms of payment. All payments MUST be received within 5 days of purchase or item will be relisted. International Buyers – Please Note: Import duties, taxes and charges are not included in the item price or shipping charges. These charges are the buyer's responsibility. Please check with your country's customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to bidding/buying. These charges are normally collected by the delivering freight (shipping) company or when you pick the item up – do not confuse them for additional shipping charges. We do not mark merchandise values below value or mark items as "gifts" - US and International government regulations prohibit such behavior. Powered by eBay Turbo Lister The free listing tool.
